name: BluZombz' Insurance the Game
description:
A game created for a Life Insurance Hackathon. The game is meant to take you through the life of a relatable character and follow their journey and achievements to see how Life Insurance impacted their life. We wanted to display Life Insurance from a different angle as an experience instead of a blatant ad placing value on your life. We also wanted to gamify the process of getting a quote.

Please play with sound for a better experience.

We hope you enjoy!
